about_the_game:
Overview

You are part of a scouting mission sent to a long-abandoned valley to investigate the ruins of a corporation that once controlled the area. However, the moment you and your team arrive, things go horribly wrong. You wake in the dead of night in your encampment to find your companions long gone—possibly dead. Waiting until daylight isn’t an option. Whatever took your crew is still out there and actively hunting you. Follow the road, get out, and keep moving.

Features

  • First-person shooting: Reminiscent of horror games such as Resident Evil 7, but limited to only a pistol and a flashlight attachment that you can find.

  • Inventory management: Manage a tight inventory that can be expanded if you find the proper equipment.

  • Four unique enemies: In this game, you are always near an enemy that can kill you in unpredictable ways. It's up to you to evade them or try to fight back.

  • Puzzles and more: Mild puzzles, a vehicle you can find and use, and unexplained phenomena are scattered throughout the valley! Some are deadly, while others are not so much...

Overview

You are part of a scouting mission sent to a long-abandoned valley to investigate the ruins of a corporation that once controlled the area. However, the moment you and your team arrive, things go horribly wrong. You wake in the dead of night in your encampment to find your companions long gone—possibly dead. name: The Overground

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: Intel processor i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: I do not recomend on running this game on old low end PC's
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: Intel processor i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With a intel i7 and rtx 3050 ti the game ran at 60 frames on the highest settings

short_description: Welcome to the Overground, you are trapped in a wide valley that you need to escape from, but of course, the valley is populated by dozens of monsters that will kill you as soon as they see you.
